casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Angela Deborah LEWIS. No. 558P04-2. Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 10, 2006. Paul M. Green, Durham, for Angela Deborah Lewis. C. Colon Willoughby, Jr., District Attorney, for State.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 9th day of March 2006 by Attorney General for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 10th day of March 2006."
